org.raxa.alertmessage

Class SMSContentFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raxa.alertmessage.SMSContentFormat

  • public class SMSContentFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Both scheduler and AudioPlayer use this class This is the schema in which JSON is stored in column-ivrMsg:content
    Author:
    Atul Agrawal
